texts.es: Felipe de 44 años de edad vive en la ciudad de Cartagena y se dedica a la venta de comidas rápidas, actividad que realiza desde hace 3 años, cuando como observador, identificó la necesidad de ofrecer un producto alimenticio de preparación rápida y exquisita. Inicialmente vendió solamente patacones, con queso y carnes frías, gradualmente diversificó su oferta agregando nuevas líneas de productos, como la hamburguesa, perros calientes, salchichas con papa frita etc. En la actualidad le ha ido muy bien y se ve en un futuro con un local muy organizado y con más productos de restaurante. Su mayor desafío para atender su creciente demanda, es no tener un capital de trabajo suficiente para responderle. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, con el cual comprará materias primas y algunos activos fijos, que necesita para su negocio, como sillas plásticas y mesas, porque el crecimiento de su clientela así se lo exige y él va a responderle. Esta es justamente la razón de éxito de su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y con el cual logrará iniciar su camino ascendente.
texts.en: Felipe is 44 years old and lives in the city of Cartagena. He makes a living selling fast food and has done this for 3 years when, as an observer, he identified the need to offer a nutritious and delicious fast food product. Initially he only sold patacones (fried plantains) with cheese and fried meat, but he gradually diversified his offerings, adding new lines of products like hamburgers, hot dogs, sausages with french fries, etc. Currently things are going very well for him and in the future a very organized business with more products than a restaurant is seen. His greatest challenge in meeting his growing demand is not having enough working capital to respond to it. This is the reason for which he turns to his Kiva loan with which he will buy raw materials and some fixed assets that he needs for his business, like plastic chairs and tables. The growth of his customers demands this and he is going to respond to it. This is just the successful reason of his Kiva loan, the first funding that he's requested from the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and with which he will achieve the start of his rising path.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and some fixed assets that he needs for his business.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is 39 years old, married, and has two children.  She lives in Nacional, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental.  Vilma has a general store that sells consumable products.  She has had this business for 12 years. 

Vilma is  requesting a loan for 5000 PHP, which she will use to purchase more stock for her store.  Vilma recently joined PMPC.  In the future, Vilma hopes to open another store in another location.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy feed for pigs like hog-grower and hog-finisher.

loans.name: 04.11.04 Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Đức is thirty-seven years old and she is married with two children. She lives with her dependent children in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

Mrs. Đức operates a food stall/restaurant selling beverages. Đức has been involved in this business for three years. The main hardship that Đức faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase drinks to resell. She is the leader of a 5-member group, the 04.11.4 Nam Ngạn solidarity group. 

In 2008, Đức joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Đức has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. With her business profit, Đức hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase drinks to resell.

loans.name: Yuhoo

texts.en:
Yuhoo is forty-two years old. She is a mother of two children and resides with her husband in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been running a tailoring shop for more than five years, earning approximately $3 per day. Her husband runs a taxi service (motor taxi). He earns about $3 per day. Her children are still in her care and in school. 

In order to improve her business, Yuhoo is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase more cloth to produce more clothes to sell. By doing so, she will earn more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase more cloth to produce more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Estrella Del Sur Group

texts.es:
Este Banco Comunal  se llama “Estrella del sur”, esta conformado por 18 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran; venta de joyas, pescaderia, artesania en madera, venta de mermeladas, venta de comida envasada. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Valdivia.
Hugo Presidente del grupo comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra de pie y es el unico hombre que conforma el Banco Comunal.
El se dedica al rubro de ventas de perfume, se ocupa de este negocio hace 7 
Meses, el cual trabaja solo.
La mercaderia que va necesitando la compra generalmente en Santiago ya que encuentra gran variedad de productos para su negocio.
Con el credito comprara todos los insumos que necesita para trabajar en su negocio.
Las metas en su negocio, es poder abrir un local en el centro de Valdivia.
Hugo vive junto a su esposa quien tabaja como Ejecutiva de Ventas  (Empresa de telefonia), y su hija de 23 años quien trabaja y estudia. Sus sueños son poner una Empresa de Publicidad.
El esta muy contento y agradecido de la oportunidad que le ha brindado Fondo Esperanza para invertir en su negocio, Ademas esta muy satisfecho con el grupo que participa, ya que son unidos y cumplidores
Valdivia es una ciudad del sur de Chile, ubicada en la región de Los Ríos. Se destaca por tener uno de los pocos ríos navegables de Chile, el Calle Calle. Valdivia presenta, dentro de sus principales actividades económicas, la industria de la construcción naval, maderera, papelera, celulosa (Celco), cervecera y molinera. El turismo desempeña un papel importante, como también los servicios educacionales universitarios, encabezados por la Universidad Austral de Chile.
texts.en:
This Communal Bank is called "Estrella del Sur" (Star of the South) and consists of 18 entrepreneurs who engage in various trades.  These include selling jewelry, selling fish, producing handicrafts out of wood, selling marmalades, and selling canned foods.  All of the members are from the city of Valdivia.  

Hugo, the president of the Communal Bank, is seen standing in the photo.  He is the only male member of the Communal Bank.  He sells perfumes and has been in this business for seven months.  Hugo works by himself.  The merchandise he will be needing will be purchased in Santiago.  He plans to acquire a wide variety of products for his business.  With this loan, he will buy all of the supplies that he needs for working in his business.  His business goals include opening a shop in the center of Valdivia.  

Hugo lives with his wife, who works as a sales executive (for a telephone company).  His 23-year-old daughter works and studies.  Hugo dreams of having a public company.  He is very pleased with and appreciative of the opportunity provided by Fondo Esperanza to invest in his business.  In addition, he is very satisfied to be participating in a group in which the members are unified and reliable.  

Valdivia is a city in southern Chile and is located in the region of Los Ríos.  This area is known for having one of the few navigable rivers in Chile, the Calle Calle.  Valdivia's main industries include ship builders, lumber mills, paper processing plants, cellulose plants (Celco), breweries, and grain mills, as well as educational institutions led by the Southern University of Chile.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise and supplies that he needs for his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools for maintenance and pay for the gasoline for her motorbike service.

loans.name: 04.11.7 Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Mrs Dung is fifty years old and she is married with two children. She lives with one dependent child (the other is grown-up) in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province. She is the leader of a 5-member group, the 04.11.7 Nam Ngạn solidarity group. 

Mrs. Dung operates a food stall/restaurant selling vegetables. Dung has been involved in this business for three years. The main hardship that Dung faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase vegetables to resell. This is Dung first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

With her business profit, Dung hopes for her business to do well, for her children to find a good job, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables to resell.

loans.name: 04.11.6 Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Lan Anh is thirty-eight years old and she is married with two children. Lan Anh lives with her two dependent children in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province. 

Mrs. Lan Anh has a service business repairing motorcycles. She is requesting a loan to purchase instruments to maintain the motorbike repair shop. Lan Anh has been involved in this business for three years. The main hardship that Lan Anh faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is the leader of a 6-member group, the 04.11.6 Nam Ngạn solidarity group. This is Lan Anh first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

With her business profit, Lan Anh hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and to make enough money to provide for them.

loans.use: to purchase instruments to maintain the motorbike repair shop.

loans.name: 04.11.5 Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hiển is fifty-two years old and she is married with one child. Her children are grown-up so she lives with no dependents in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province. She is the leader of a 4-member group, the 04.11.5 Nam Ngạn solidarity group. 

Mrs. Hiển has a retail business selling coal. Hiển has been involved in this business for three years. The main hardship that Hiển faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase coal to resell. This is Hiển first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

With her business profit, Hiển hopes for her business to do well, for her children to find a good job, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase coal to resell.

loans.name: 06.01.13 Đông Vệ Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thi is sixty-one years old and she is married with three children. Her children are grown up, so she lives with no dependents in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province. 

Mrs. Thi operates a food stall/restaurant selling snacks. Thi has been involved in this business for five years. The main hardship that Thi faces in her business is the lack of capital.She is requesting a loan to purchase materials to make processed food to sell. Thi is the group leader of the 06.01.13 Đông Vệ solidarity group, which consists of 4 members. 

In 2010, Thi joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Thi has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. With her business profit, Thi hopes for her business to do well, for her children to find a good job, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase materials to make processed food to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo and beverages.

loans.name: Ellein

texts.en:
Ellein is 44 years old and lives in Ubay, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with four children.

To earn a living, Ellein has a business selling snacks. She earns about 2,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) each month doing this type of work. Ellein has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase more stock for her snack vending business.

Ellein has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Ellein would like to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her snack vending business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools for maintenance and pay for the gasoline for his motorbike service.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools for repairing tires, motorcycles, and bicycles

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en: Lolita is 59 years old and lives in Tabo-o, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has seven children. Lolita has a shop that sells canned goods and other consumable products. She has had this business for one year. She requested a loan to purchase additional consumable goods for resale. Lolita has been a member of PMPC for almost 11 years. In the future, Lolita hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more inventory for her general store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sacks of calamansi to make calamansi juice

loans.name: Sambath

texts.en: Sambath is 52 years old. She is a mother of three children and resides with her husband in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling boiled corn and potatoes for more than three years, earning approximately $4 per day. Two of her children are employed in the garment factory business. They earn about $7 per day. Sambath wants to rebuild her present house. With this goal in mind, Sambath is requesting a loan of $700 to purchase construction materials to rebuild her house. This money will help her provide a better living condition for her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her youngest son earn a bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to rebuild her house

loans.name: Socorro Rosa

texts.es:
La socia Socorro nació en la ciudad de Cusco del departamento del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, ella tiene 45 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene dos hijos. La socia Socorro tiene su carro propio que le sirve para brindar servicio de movilidad escolar y también vende tortas. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va excelente gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. La socia Socorro requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como harina, azúcar y otras cosas más. Su sueño de Socorro es comprarse una casa.

La socia Socorro pertenece al banco comunal “San Antonio” de la Asociación Arariwa de la provincia del Cusco.
texts.en:
Socorro is a member who was born in the city of Cusco in the Department of Cusco, and she still lives in the same city. She is 45 years old, married, and has two children. Socorro has her own vehicle that she uses for providing school transportation services, but she also sells cakes. She has been in business for several years and has done an excellent job thanks to the effort she puts into her work. Socorro is requesting a loan in order to buy supplies such as flour, sugar, and other ingredients. Her dream is to buy a house.

Socorro is a member of the San Antonio Communal Bank, which is part of Asociación Arariwa in Cusco Province.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Laura Matilde

texts.es:
LAURA MATILDE tiene 40 años de edad es soltera tiene dos hijos, vive con los hijos en Ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

LAURA MATILDE se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra  de maíz. Solicita el crédito para comprar urea, insecticidas, fertilizantes, líquidos para la maleza.

 Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para la agricultura. Las compras lo hará en Ventanas. El sueño es poder tener un negocio propio y un cultivo de cacao.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es el mal clima. En el tiempo libre le gusta ir de paseo por la ciudad.
texts.en:
Laura Matilde is 40 years old, single, and has two children. She lives with them in Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

Laura Matilde is a farmer who grows corn. She is requesting a loan in order to buy urea, insecticides, fertilizers, and liquid weed killers. With the help of this loan, she will be able to buy the necessary supplies for farming. Her purchases are conducted in Ventanas. Her dream is to have a house of her own and to start a crop of cacao. The challenges she must confront include dealing with bad weather.

In her free time, Laura Matilde enjoys strolling through the city.

loans.use: to buy urea, insecticides, fertilizers, and liquid weed killers.

loans.name: Andrea Ana

texts.es: La Sra. Andrea  tiene 54 años y es casada con 3 hijos que son de las edades de 15, 12 y 10 años,   ella se dedica a la venta de comida en su puesto de venta que se encuentra en una calle muy concurrida de la ciudad de La Paz,  este préstamo es la primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Andrea  va a usar este préstamo para la compra de insumos para la elaboración de sus comidas también para el arreglo de su kiosco de venta,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital para la mejora de su kiosko, la Sra. Andrea enfrenta retos en su negocio que son tener una  infraestructura más cómoda y va a utilizar los beneficios comprando por mayor los insumos para la elaboración de su comida.
texts.en:
Andrea, 54, is married with three children whose ages are 15, 12 and 10 years.  

She sells food in a stand located on a very busy street in the city of La Paz.  This loan is her first sequence within the institution.  

Andrea will use the loan to buy ingredients to make her dishes and also to fix up her sales kiosk.  Her reason for requesting the loan is the lack of capital to make improvements to her kiosk.  

The challenge that Andrea’s business faces is the lack of a more comfortable infrastructure and she will use profits to buy ingredients to prepare her dishes at wholesale.

loans.use: to buy supplies and to repair the kiosk.

loans.name: Channa

texts.en: Channa is 31 years old. She is a mother of five children and resides with her husband in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband is employed by a construction company. He earns about 10 USD per day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Channa is requesting a loan of 1,000 USD to purchase construction materials for her husband to use in his construction work. By doing so, her husband will earn more profit to support the family. In the future, she would like to purchase a store in the market to sell fruit and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials

loans.name: Mariana Jasmine

texts.es:
En  el sector conocido como Estancia Vieja en la parroquia Colon  de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúnen  cada quince días las socias  del Banco Comunal Estancia Vieja. Lugar de gente humilde y dedicada a la agricultura y al comercio en general.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Mariana, tiene 36 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 16, 1 4 y 12 de edad, todos estudian en colegio. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura.

Nuestra amiga se dedica a la cría de chanchos y  aves de corral, tiene una pequeña granja en su casa, ella en temporadas compra una gran cantidad de pollos los cuales los cría por tres meses que es el tiempo que se demora en estar listos para la venta, después de este tiempo los entrega a algunas tiendas en la localidad o también vende por libras  y en pie a comerciante que llegan hasta su casa.  Lleva 5 años dedicada a esta labor y esto le permite ayudar a sus hijos con los gastos de sus estudios.

Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar pollos, alimento y medicinas tanto para los pollos como para los chanchos. Es fundadora del Banco comunal, es la secretaria del grupo y está muy contenta porque  le han ayudado mucho. 

Su sueño es  ver que sus hijos sean buenos profesionales y es por eso que lucha todos los días.
texts.en:
The members of the “Estancia Vieja” communal bank meet every fifteen days in the city of Portoviejo’s Colon Parish’s Estancia Vieja sector.  This is a place of humble people dedicated to agriculture and general commerce.

We met Mariana, 36, here.  She’s married and has three children who are 16, 14 and 12 years old; all attend school.  Her husband works in agriculture.

Our girlfriend raises pigs and barnyard fowl; she has a small farm at home.  In various seasons she buys large numbers of chicks that she raises for three months which is the time it takes to get them ready for sale.  After this period of time she sells them to local stores or also by the pound or live to merchants that come by her house.  She’s been doing this work for five years and it allows her to help with her children’s schooling costs.

She will use this new loan to buy chicks, feed and medicine both for the chicks and for the pigs.  She’s a founding member of the communal bank and is the group secretary; she’s very happy because they’ve helped her much.  Her dream is to see her children become good professionals and that’s what she strives for every day.

loans.use: to buy chicks, feed and medicine.

loans.name: Bernadeth

texts.en: Bernadeth is 41 years old and lives in Buenavista, Tudela. She is married and has three children. Bernadeth has a store that sells a variety of products. Bernadeth has had this business for 20 years. Bernadeth requested a loan of 14,900 PHP to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc. Bernadeth has been a member of PMPC for six years. In the future, Bernadeth hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Maria Etelvina

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 47 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, con 4 hijos a su cargo, vive con su esposo e hijos, en el distrito de Oyotùn, provincia de Chiclayo, departamento de Lambayeque. Esta zona cuenta con los servicios básicos de luz, agua y desagüe, y la actividad económica es la agricultura y el comercio.

María se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, desde hace 10 años, en su propio domicilio, donde cuenta con clientes ya fidelizados; además también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, lo que le permite tener otros ingresos adicionales. Su cónyuge también le apoya en esta actividad, existiendo una buena relación entre ellos.

El monto del  préstamo solicitado por Maria es de S/. 1000 nuevos soles, y será destinado para la compra de abarrotes para surtir su  bodega, y de esta forma poder mejorar su calidad de  vida de su familia.
texts.en:
María is a 47 year old woman with a spouse and four children in her care; she lives with her spouse and children in Oyotún District in Chiclayo 
Province, Lambayeque Department.  This zone has the basic utilities: electricity, water and sewage.  The main economic activity is agriculture and commerce.

María has sold groceries for more than 10 years at home where she has regular, loyal customers.  She also raises small farm animals producing extra income.  Her spouse supports her in what she does there being a good relationship between the two of them.

María is requesting a loan in the amount of 1000 new soles to buy groceries to stock her store in order to improve her family’s quality of life by this means.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Raquel

texts.en:
Raquel is forty-four years old and lives in Tabo-o, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with five children. 

Raquel has a general store that sells different items and consumable goods. She has had this business for fifteen years. She requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase more stock for her general store.

Raquel has been a member of PMPC for almost a year. In the future, Raquel hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, shampoo, soap and beverages.

loans.name: Rorn

texts.en:
Rorn is thirty-three years old. He is a father of two children and resides with his wife in Battambang Province, Cambodia. He has been running a taxi service (motor taxi) for more than four years, earning approximately $10 per day. His wife is a rice farmer who earns about $3 per day. His children are still in his care and in school. 

In order to improve his family’s living condition, Rorn is requesting a loan of $800 to purchase a Tuk Tuk to run the taxi service. This purchase will enable him to generate more income to support the family. In the future, he would like to expand his business and help his children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, he hopes to rebuild his house to make it bigger and more convenient for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a Tuk Tuk to run the taxi service.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools for the maintenance of her motorcycle and pay for the gasoline.

loans.name: Rano

texts.ru: Раъно продолжает свою деятельность. Кредит берет для покупки летней детской одежды, обуви и тканей.
texts.en: Rano continues her business.  She is requesting this loan to buy children's summer clothing, shoes and fabrics.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal merchandise

loans.name: Hikmat

texts.ru: Хикмат добрая и честная женщина, она замужем и любящая мать четверых детей. Более 6 лет она занимается выращиванием картошки и зерна. Кроме земледелия она занимается скотоводством. Отходы от выращивания идут на корм скота. От полученной прибыли она хочет сделать приданное для своей дочки. В бизнесе помогают супруг и дети. Хикмат запрашивает займ для покупки минеральных удобрений. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Hikmat is a kind and honest woman, who is married and a loving mother of four children.  She has been involved in growing potatoes and grains for over six years.  Besides farming, she is involved in animal husbandry.  The leftovers from growing crops go toward feeding the livestock.  Hikmat wants to use her obtained profit to put together a dowry for her daughter.  Her husband and children help her with the business.  Hikmat is requesting this loan to buy mineral fertilizers.  She relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Narantuya

texts.en:
Mrs. Narantuya, forty-six, is a railroader and she has been doing her job for over twenty-seven years nonstop. She lives with her husband and two daughters in their old apartment which is in Kherlen, an eastern city in Mongolia. Her husband is a builder and now he works as a construction decorator in a private company. Their salaries do not usually suffice for the family's necessities. 

Recently she bought a small plot of land in the boundary area of Kherlen. Her family is planning to build a ger and fence it in. A ger is a Mongolian traditional nomadic yurt and it is comfortable to live in for small families. But it is quite cold in winter without the additional cover which is the same as wall insulation, and it costs a lot of money for the smoky coal which is used to warm the ger inside. Using the additional ger cover cuts the smoky coal usage notably and it contributes to reducing air pollution in the city. Air pollution and air quality is one of biggest issues in most Mongolian households and big cities. Mrs. Narantuya believes that her plan is environmentally friendly. The loan she is taking will be dedicated to buy the new ger cover and building materials to build the fence around her plot of land.

loans.use: To buy a new cover for her ger and building materials to build the fence around her plot of land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo and beverages to stock in her store.

loans.name: Mahougnon Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MAHOUGNON est formé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Mahoumè Elisabeth, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Mahoumè Elisabeth est âgée de 36 ans et ne vit plus avec son mari. Mahoumè Elisabeth a quatre enfants, tous scolarisés et à sa charge. Mahoumè Elisabeth n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Mahoumè Elisabeth vit seule avec ses enfants et assure seule les charges de la maison. Mahoumè Elisabeth vend du la farine de blé depuis une dizaine d'année, ce qui lui permet d'assurer ses divers besoins. Mahoumè Elisabeth s’approvisionne dans un marché du Benin. Dans le but d’augmenter le stock de ses produits et de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, Mahoumè Elisabeth désire obtenir un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MAHOUGNON. Les crédits précédents ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
MAHOUGNON is a group of three people who live in the same neighborhood. This is the group’s third time seeking financial assistance from ALIDé to bolster their activities. 

The group’s representative is Mahoumè Elisabeth, age 36, seen with her hand raised in the photo. Mahoumè Elisabeth no longer lives with her husband. She has four dependent children who all go to school. Mahoumè Elisabeth never went to school. She lives alone with her children, and she handles the household responsibilities on her own. To that end, she started selling wheat flour about ten years ago. She buys her stock at a market in Benin.

To replenish her stock and better meet the needs of her customers, Mahoumè Elisabeth is seeking a third loan from ALIDé together with the other members of the group MAHOUGNON. Past loans were correctly repaid.

loans.use: to buy wheat flour for resale.

loans.name: Catherine Julissa

texts.es:
Julissa es una joven de 23 años, vive al lado de su esposo y de su pequeña hija de 2 años, por la cual trabaja muy duro para darle lo mejor y para que tenga una buena calidad de vida y sobre todo con amor. Su vivienda se encuentra ubicada en la ciudad de Pisco, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido, hermosas playas, atractivos turísticos hermosos como las “Islas Ballestas y el candelabro de Paracas, asimismo en él se desarrolla la agricultura y la pesca y también se le conoce por la calidez de sus pobladores. Julissa anteriormente trabajaba como mesera en un restaurante muy conocido en la ciudad y poco a poco fue ahorrando y se animo a iniciar su negocio de Servicios turísticos, tuvo esta idea porque a su ciudad siempre van muchos turistas y vio la opción de un trabajo mejor al que tenia, ella es muy carismática y sobre todo amable es por ello que ella nos cuenta que le va bien en su negocio.

Julissa está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá realizar un mejoramiento en su negocio como comprar accesorios para su oficina, construir un baño, pintar su negocio, entre otros, de esta manera podrá brindar una mejor atención a sus clientes y mejorara sus ingresos, así ella seguirá luchando cada día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación y calidad de vida para su hija y ser la mejor agencia de viajes de su ciudad”.
texts.en:
Julissa is a 23-year-old young woman.  She lives with her husband and her young two-year-old daughter.  She works very hard and with love to give her the best, so she has a good quality of life.

Her home is located in the city of Pisco, known for having a warm climate, beautiful beaches, and magnificent tourist attractions such as the Paracas Candelabra [a geoglyph] and the Ballestas Islands.  In addition, there is agriculture and fishing there, and it also is known for the warmth of its residents.

Previously Julissa worked as a waitress in a very well-known restaurant in the city.  Little by little she saved and she got interested in starting her business in tourism services.  She had this idea because many tourists always go to her city, and she saw the option of a better job than the one she had.  She is very charismatic and kind.  It is because of this, she tells us, that it is going well for her in her business.

Julissa is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because, thanks to the help they have offered, she will be able to make improvements on her business such as buying office accessories, putting in a bathroom, painting the business, and others.  In this way she will be able to give her customers better service and improve her income.  Thus she will continue fighting every day to make her biggest dream a reality: "To give her daughter a good education and quality of life, and to be the best travel agency in her city."

loans.use: to buy office accessories and to paint the front of the building.

loans.name: Samoeurn

texts.en:
Samoeurn is 46 years old.  He is the father of four children and resides with his wife in Battambang Province, Cambodia.  He is a sculptor who earns about $10 per day. His wife is a tailor.  She earns about $2 per day.  Two of his children are construction workers who earn approximately $5 per day. 

To address the difficulties in the family’s transportation, Samoeurn is requesting a loan of $700 to purchase a motorbike for commuting.  This purchase would enable him to use the money he saves on transportation expenses to support the family.  

In the future, he would like to expand his business and help his children earn bachelor’s degrees.  Moreover, he hopes to rebuild his present house to make it more convenient for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Ismoil

texts.ru: Исмоил женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Более 15 лет занимается скотоводством, а также выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. Он покупает скот на местном рынка, откармливает их, а затем продает за выгодную цену. Корм покупает на рынке города. На полученную прибыль Исмоил намерен отремонтировать свой дом. Исмоил хотел бы получить займ для покупки крупного рогатого скота с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Ismoil is married and raising three children.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for over 15 years and also in growing agricultural crops.  He buys livestock at a local market, fattens it up and then sells it at an advantageous price.  He buys livestock feed at a city market.  Ismoil intends to use his obtained profit to repair his house.  Ismoil wants to obtain this loan to buy cattle in order to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Komiljon

texts.ru: Комилчон женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Более 13 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота. В обороте имеет несколько голов скота. Кроме скотоводства он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. Отходы от выращивания идут на корм скота. Он хочет получить хорошую прибыль, и намерен купить мебель для своего дома. Комилчон запрашивает займ для покупки 2 голов быка с целью расширения бизнеса.  Комилчон надеется на вашу доброту и помощь.
texts.en: Komiljon is married and raising four children.  He has been involved in buying and selling livestock for over 13 years.  He has several heads of livestock in circulation.  Besides animal husbandry, he is involved in growing agricultural crops.  The leftovers from growing crops go toward feeding the livestock.  He wants to make a good profit and intends to buy furniture for his house.  Komiljon is requesting this loan to buy two heads of bulls in order to expand his business.  Komiljon relies on your kindness and help.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es:
Josefina tiene 42 años, es una mujer humilde y laboriosa, siempre está al pendiente de su familia. Vive en su casa propia junto a su pareja Máximo, de 47 años, y sus cinco hijos, quienes son el motivo del esfuerzo que realiza cada día.

Durante 12 años que se dedica al cultivo de cacao, el cual le sirve para solventar los gastos de su familia, sobre todo de la educación de sus hijos. Esta actividad la realiza desde las 5:30 am con la ayuda de su esposo, y los fines de semana junto a sus hijos.
Lo que más le gusta de esta labor es obtener una buena cosecha después de tanto esfuerzo y que le remuneren bien en los centros de acopio por cada kilogramo de cacao. Josefina comenta que los problemas que siempre le aqueja a cada agricultor son las malezas que crecen entre las plantas. Por ello que acude a MFP para solicitar un préstamo que ayude a solucionar los problemas que interrumpen en la obtención de sus siembras y pueda seguir con los planes de trabajo. Para su futuro desea lograr que sus hijos sean profesionales.

Este es su crédito número 9 con MFP, se siente contenta por recibir este apoyo, y se compromete a ser puntual en sus cuotas de pago. En su banco comunal es una persona que colabora en las decisiones e sus compañeros. 
Con los 2,000 nuevos soles que ahora solicita contratará peones para que la apoyen a eliminar las malezas de sus plantas. Con el resto comprará abono para fertilizar sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Josefina, 42, is a humble, hardworking woman; she’s always watching over her family.  She lives in her own house with her spouse, Máximo, 47, and their five children who are the motivation for her daily efforts.

She’s been growing cocoa beans for 12 years to cover family expenses, especially her children’s schooling costs.  She carries out this activity starting at 5:30am with help from her husband and on weekends alongside her children too.

What she likes best about this work is obtaining a good harvest after so much effort and to receive a good remuneration at the gathering centers for each kilogram of cocoa beans.  Josefina comments that the problems all growers face is the weeds that grow among the plants.  This is why she’s calling on MFP to request a loan that will help her solve the problems that interfere with her getting good crop yields so that she can continue with her work plans.  For the future, she’d like her children to become professionals.

This is her 9th MFP loan and she feels happy to receive this support and commits to be punctual with her installment payments.   She’s a person who collaborates with her fellow communal bank members’ decisions.

She will use the 2000 new soles requested now to hire day laborers to help her get rid of the weeds around her plants; she will use the rest to buy fertilizer for her crops.

loans.use: to buy manure and hire day laborers.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es:
Marcelina tiene 48 años, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Esteban, de 51 años, y sus cuatro queridos hijos, a quienes brinda una buena calidad de vida. 

Desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana empieza su labor, primero prepara el desayuno para sus hijos y luego enviarlos a la escuela. Posteriormente se dirige a sus campos de cultivo junto a su esposo, quien la apoya durante todo el día, evitando las malezas que incomodan el crecimiento y obtención de los frutos de cacao. 
Por otra parte, su mayor anhelo es incrementar sus plantaciones de cacao y tener una mayor producción. 

Este es su crédito número 5 con MFP, se siente feliz de contar con este apoyo económico, por lo que se compromete a ser puntual en sus cuotas de pago y no hacer quedar mal a los socios de su banco comunal, quienes confían en su responsabilidad.
Con los 3,000 nuevos soles que solicita sembrará injertos de sus plantas, y con el resto adquirirá abono.
texts.en:
Marcelina, age 48, lives in her own house with her husband, 51 year old Esteban, and their four beloved children, for whom she provides a good quality of life.

She starts working in the very early hours of the morning.  First she makes breakfast for her children, and then she sends them to school.  After that, she heads to the fields together with her husband.  They clear the weeds that make it difficult for the cacao plants to grow and produce fruit.  Her greatest desire is to plant more cacao and to have greater production.

This is her fifth loan with MFP.  She is happy to have this financial support.  She pledges to be punctual with her payments and to not make the members of her communal bank look bad.  The members rely on her responsibility.  She will use the requested 3,000 soles to plant grafts of her cacao plants, and she will use the rest to get fertilizer.

loans.use: to plant and to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Jonny

texts.es:
Jonny es un hombre de 39 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, con 1 hijo a su cargo, vive con su cónyuge e hijo en casa propia, en el caserío Santa Elena, Distrito de Tambogrande, departamento de Piura; esta zona solo cuenta con servicio de energía eléctrica y el consumo de agua lo hacen a través de piletas comunales. Bajo estas condiciones viven estas familias.

La actividad que desarrolla Jonny es la crianza/venta de ovinos y cerdos, estos los alimenta a base de concentrados y cuando alcanzan tamaño y peso exacto los comercializa a los comerciantes mayoristas de la zona; así mismo cuenta con 1,0 has de terreno agrícola sembrado de limón, donde viene cosechando semanalmente y le permite tener otros ingresos adicionales, su cónyuge se dedica a la crianza de aves de corral y lo apoya en sus actividades.

 El monto del préstamo solicitado por Jonny es de s/. 1000 nuevos soles, este será invertido en la mejora de corrales y en la compra de fertilizantes para cultivo de limón,  esto le permitirá seguir creciendo con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Jonny is 39 years of age and lives with his partner. He has one child under his care, and lives with his son and spouse in his own house in the Santa Elena area of the Tambogrande administrative division, located in the province of Piura. This area only has electricity services, and water is obtained through communal fountains. The families in the area live under these conditions.


Jonny raises and sells sheep and pigs, which he feeds on concentrated feed. When they have reached the right size and weight he sells them to wholesalers in the area. He also has one hectare of farmland planted with lime trees. He harvests this land every week, which gives him additional income. His spouse raises free-range poultry, and helps him with his business.


Jonny has requested a loan of 1,000 nuevos soles. He plans to use the loan to improve his animals' pens and buy fertilizers to grow lemons, allowing him to expand his business and improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to improve the pens for his animals and buy fertilizer to grow produce.

loans.name: Khaticha

texts.ru: Хатича проживает в районе Дангара. Ей 57 лет. Она замужем. У нее пятеро детей. Хатича имеет высшее педагогическое образование. Более тридцати лет она преподает в школе. Кроме того в свободное от работы время предоставляет услугу. Она занимается шитьем платьев. Этим видом деятельности занимается три года. Кредит берет для покупки швейной машинки.
texts.en: Khaticha lives in the Dangara district.  She is 57 years old, married and has five children.  Khaticha has a higher pedagogical education.  She has been teaching at a school for over thirty years.  Besides this, she provides a service in her time free of work.  Khaticha is involved in sewing dresses.  She has been in this business for three years.  She is requesting this loan to buy a sewing machine.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Pheap

texts.en:
Pheap is 41 years old.  She is the mother of four children and resides with her husband in Battambang Province, Cambodia.  

She has been involved in the agricultural business for more than 20 years, has extensive experience and is successful in her career.  She is involved in growing rice and fattening livestock. She earns approximately $7 per day.  Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $3 per day.  Three of her children are construction workers as well and, together they earn about $9 per day. 

In order to improve her farming work, Pheap is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase a walking tractor trailer to use for carrying her crops as well as to support running a delivery service.  This purchase would enable her to transport her crops easily and earn more income to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her youngest child earn a bachelor’s degree.  Moreover, she hopes to build a bigger house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a walking tractor trailer to use for carrying her crops and to support running a delivery service.

loans.name: Rewel

texts.en:
Rewel is the father of four children, all of school going ages. He has been in farming for ten years, with his farm producing and selling milk, vegetables, bananas, maize and beans.

Rewel has requested a loan of 30,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy a chaff cutter for feeding his dairy animals. He says this will help ease the feeding and reduce wastage in fodder and other feeds. He hopes to get more income from dairy farming and plans to use the income to expand his greenhouse and farming in general besides educating his children.

He compliments Juhudi Kilimo financial services.

loans.use: To buy a chaff cutter

loans.name: Dzombo

texts.en:
Dzombo, 59, is a married man with four children; 30, 23, 3 and 2 years old. Two of these children are still in school. He lives in his own house that neither has electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expense is medication.

For the past seven years, he has been selling livestock to his customers at the market. Dzombo faces a major challenge of thieves. He dreams of operating a slaughter house where he would sell meat to the local butcheries.

With the KES 50,000 he wants to purchase three cows for sale. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: To purchase three cows for his livestock business

loans.name: Aida Magdalena

texts.es:
En  el sector conocido como Estancia Vieja en la parroquia Colon  de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúnen  cada quince días las socias  del Banco Comunal Estancia Vieja. Lugar de gente humilde y dedicada a la agricultura y al comercio en general.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Aida, tiene 48 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cinco hijos, tres mayores de edad y dos de 16 y 15 de edad los mismos que   estudian en colegio y son los que aun viven con ella. Su esposo es guardián.

Nuestra amiga es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto poder ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de bisutería y  accesorios para damas, ella se desplaza los fines de semana y en temporadas de ferias a otros cantones donde instala un pequeño puesto para vender sus productos, ella vende pulseras, collares, lasos, moños y varias cosas más, tiene más de 5 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar bisutería y accesorios para damas. Esta desde el inicio  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque con los créditos pudo financiar su negocio.
 
Su sueño es tener un carro para realizar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Every two weeks the members of the village bank known as Estancia Vieja meet in the neighborhood of Estancia Vieja, located in the Colon parish of the city of Portoviejo. This area is home to humble people who work in agriculture and general trade.

Aida lives in this area. She is 48 years of age, married and has five children with her husband. Three of her children are adults, while the other two are 16 and 15 years of age. These younger children are at school and live with her. Her husband is a caretaker.

Aida is a housewife, and to obtain her own income and help her husband with the household expenses, she sells costume jewelry and accessories for women. At the weekends and during fair time she goes to other cantons, where she sets up a small stall to sell her products. These include bracelets, necklaces, bows, hair accessories and other items. She has worked in this way for more than five years, and has been very successful.


She plans to use this loan is to buy costume jewelry and accessories for women. Aida has been with the communal bank since it was first set up, and she likes it because the loans obtained have been able to finance her business. Her dream is to have a car to use when selling her products.

loans.use: To buy costume jewelry and accessories for women.

loans.name: Henry

texts.en:
Henry is a farmer in the Kisii area of the South Rift in Kenya.  He is married with 10 children who are all adults.  The youngest child still lives at home while attending school.  He has 30 years of experience in farming and runs a farm that currently produces tea, coffee, maize and milk, which he sells to the local market.

Henry has requested a loan of 60,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy a dairy cow.  He plans to have a farm with at least four dairy cows in the next five years.  He believes the acquisition of a better breed of cow will improve his income.  He states that the poor road network, animal diseases and occasional drought are the main challenges he faces in his business.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
Mohamed is a married man with 3 children, all of whom attend school. He rents a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are food, school fees and medical bills.

For the past one and a half years, he has operated a food stall, selling mainly flat bread and beans to his neighbours.  Mohamed faces a major challenge of seasonality. He dreams of expanding his business in the future.

With the KES 20,000 he wants to purchase additional stock; mainly bales of wheat flour and maize flour. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: To purchase bales of wheat flour and maize flour for his food stall

loans.name: Mirzobadal

texts.ru: Мирзобадал женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Более 20 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота, а также выращиванием картошки, морковь и ячменя. Он хочет расширить свой бизнес и получить хорошую прибыль. Мирзобадал намерен построить сарай и умножить поголовье скота. В будущем от полученного дохода хочет дать высшее образования своим детям. Его жена помогает ему развитию бизнеса. Мирзобадал запрашивает займ для покупки крупного и мелкого рогатого скота с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Mirzobadal is married and raising three children.  He has been involved in buying and selling livestock and also growing potatoes, carrots and barley for over 20 years.  He wants to expand his business and make a good profit.  Mirzobadal intends to build a barn and increase livestock headcount.  In the future, he wants to use his earnings to provide a higher education for his children.  His wife helps him with developing the business.  Mirzobadal is requesting this loan to buy cattle and small livestock in order to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy cattle and small livestock

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is a resident and a farmer in Murang'a area of Central Kenya. She is married with four adult children and has been in farming for thirty years. Her farm produces mainly milk and coffee for the local market.

Nancy has requested a loan of 41,600 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow. She says this will help improve her farming income and standard of living by making her more self-reliant. She has high hopes for her dairy farming and plans to have a farm of mixed breeds.

She laments unstable markets which lead to fluctuation in market prices. She advocates for more individual loans.

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Marciano

texts.es:
Marciano tiene 57 años, es un hombre divorciado, pero responsable de los gastos de educación para sus cuatro hijos, quienes son su motivo de seguir adelante.

Se dedica a la venta de ropa, su puesto está ubicado en el mercado de su localidad. Esta labor viene realizando hace más de 33 años y comenta que siempre le ha ido muy bien con sus ventas; ya que sabe atender a las personas, con amabilidad. La gente de su localidad sabe que las mejores prendas las vende Marciano, sabe de moda y da buenos consejos a cada cliente. 
Con el tiempo desea seguir con esta actividad, porque es lo que mejor sabe hacer, y poder tener la capacidad de abrir sucursales de su tienda en diferentes localidades.

Este es su préstamo número 11 con MFP, y se siente contento por la confianza que le brindan; ya que es una persona responsable pagando sus cuotas, como también en las reuniones de su banco comunal. 
Marciano invertirá los 3,000 nuevos soles que solicita en abastecer de nuevas prendas su puesto ropa.
texts.en:
Marciano is 57. He is divorced, but responsible for education expenses for his four children, who are his motivation to keep moving forward. 

He sells clothing, and his shop is located in the local market. He has been doing this for over 33 years, and mentions sales have always gone very well, because he knows how to serve his customers kindly. The people in his town know that Marciano sells the best clothing items. He knows about fashion and gives good advice to every customer. 

He wishes to continue in this line of work because it is what he knows how to do best, and in time he would like to be able to open branches of his store in different towns.

This is his 11th loan with MFP, and he feels happy, because of the trust they offer him. He shows responsibility in paying his installments and also at his communal bank meetings.

Marciano will invest the 3,000 nuevos soles he is requesting in stocking his clothing shop with new items of clothing.

loans.use: to increase his merchandise.

loans.name: Jogan

texts.en:
Jogan is 18 years old, single, and residing at San Juan, Panaon, Philippines.

Jogan is operating a gardening business to earn a living and has been in this business 10 years. Each month, he earns 5,000 PHP doing this type of business.

He requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers such as manure. This year, Jogan joined GDMPC. Jogan wants to save some profits as a reserve for future emergencies and to purchase other farmland.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure

loans.name: Asha

texts.en:
Asha is a woman with three children, all of whom are in school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity but no piped water. Asha has been selling clothes in a shop for the last four years, her primary customers being women in the neighborhood. She aspires to open a boutique in the future. She decided to join Yehu so as to get financial support through loans to boost her business. Her greatest monthly expense is food and school fees.
The loan of Ksh 20000 will enable her to purchase bundles of clothes to sell.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Narzi

texts.ru: Нарзи трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Более 18 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота и выращиванием картошки. Жена помогает по бизнесу, а также дети помогают в свободное время. Нарзи хочет получить хорошую прибыль, чтобы улучшить свои условия. Нарзи запрашивает займ для покупки крупного и мелкого рогатого скота, а также семян для посева. Нарзи надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Narzi is a hardworking and kind person.  He is married and raising four children.  He has been involved in buying and selling livestock and growing potatoes for over 18 years.  His wife helps with the business and so do the children in their free time.  Narzi wants to make a good profit in order to improve his conditions.  Narzi is requesting this loan to buy cattle and small livestock and also seeds for sowing.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy livestock and seeds

loans.name: Sitoramoh

texts.ru: Ситорамох проживает в районе Дангара. Ей 22 года. Она замужем. У нее один ребенок. Ситорамох у себя дома занимается шитьем. В этой области она два года. Кредит берет для приобретения швейной машинки.
texts.en: Sitoramoh lives in the Dangara district.  She is 22 years old, married and has one child.  Sitoramoh is involved in sewing at home.  She has been in this business for two years.  She is requesting this loan to buy a sewing machine.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Nabi

texts.ru: Наби женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Более 13 лет он занимается скотоводством, а также выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. Покупает скот на местном базаре и откармливает их в течении определенного периода затем продает за выгодную цену. Наби хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота с целью расширения бизнеса. Наби надеется на вашу помощь и щедрость.
texts.en: Nabi is married and raising four children.  He has been involved in animal husbandry and also growing agricultural crops for over 13 years.  He buys livestock at a local market, fattens it up during a set period of time and then sells it at an advantageous price.  Nabi wants to obtain this loan to buy livestock in order to expand his business.  Nabi relies on your help and generosity.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Kenzheaiym

texts.ru: Кенжайым – лидер группы «Тансулуу», объединяющей еще двух женщин – участниц. Кенжайым 31 год, замужем,  имеет 3 детей. В качестве  источника дохода для семьи, в 2004 году Кенжайым начала  заниматься животноводством и полеводством.  Начатое со стартовой суммы в 4,000 сом (KGS)  хозяйство  на сегодня насчитывает 2 коров и 3 бычков и приносит около 6,000 сом (KGS) в месяц с продажи молока и молочных продуктов. Учитывая то, что Кенжайым имеет в хозяйстве 0,7 га земли, она обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку минеральных удобрений и семян хлопка. Доходы Кенжайым планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего  хозяйства.
texts.en: Kenzheaiym is the leader of the "Tansuluu" group that unites two more women, participants.  Kenzheaiym is 31 years old, married and has three children.  To provide a source of income for her family, she became involved in animal husbandry and farming in 2004.  The business started with a sum of 4,000 som (KGS), today contains two cows and three bulls and yields about 6,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of milk and milk products.  Considering that Kenzheaiym has 0.7 hectares of land in her business, she requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy mineral fertilizers and cotton seeds.  She plans to invest the earnings into a continued expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: Ronald

texts.es:
Ronald es un joven de 28 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Camana, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener una preciosas playas en las cuales uno puede gozar de lo hermoso de su paisaje, también se desarrolla la pesca y la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de arroz, considerado uno de los mejores del mundo, también podemos encontrar variedad de platos típicos pero en especial el riquísimo Chupe de Camarones. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta ir de pesca y pasear en la playa, asimismo le gusta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con pato”.

Con dedicación Ronald trabaja en su negocio de venta de pinturas, él le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 12 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 16 clientes diariamente; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable y sobre todo respetuoso con los clientes.

Ronald está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar más mercadería para a su negocio como pintura, brochas, lijas, entre otros, lo que le permitirá tener mayor variedad de productos para ofrecer asi como también mejorar sus ingresos, de esta manera podrá seguir trabajando cada día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:”  Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Ronald, 28, is a young man living in the city of Camana, a city noted for having beautiful beaches where one can enjoy the beauty of its scenery.  Fishing and agriculture also occur here, especially the growing of rice that’s considered to be among the world’s best.  We can also find a variety of typical dishes, especially the very delicious “Chupe de Camarones.”  When he has free time available he likes to go fishing and for walks on the beach; he also likes to enjoy one of his favorite dishes which is the very delicious “Arroz con Pollo.”

Ronald works with diligence in his paint store.  He spends about 12 hours daily and can see up to 16 customers per day.  He believes that he does well in his business because he’s very kind and above all very respectful to his customers.

Ronald is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they’ve given him he will be able to buy merchandise for his business like paint, brushes and sandpaper, among others, which will allow him to have a wider variety of products to offer as well as improve his income to continue striving every day to make his greatest dream a reality: to own a house.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (paint, brushes, sandpaper, among others).

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.en: Trinidad is from the town of San Jose, Talibon. She is 42 years old, married and has four children between the ages of 9 and 18. Trinidad is a coconut farmer and makes copra (source of coconut oil) for selling. She needs a loan to purchase materials for making copra. Trinidad hopes to earn more so she can support her children's education. In the future, she would like to have a successful business and successful children.

loans.use: to purchase materials for making copra

loans.name: Marìa Luisa

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 48 años de edad, de estado civil casada, con dos hijos a su cargo. Vive en casa propia con su cónyuge e hijos, en la parte rural del distrito de Tambogrande, departamento de Piura; este sector solo cuenta con el servicio básico de luz, el consumo de agua lo hacen a través de norias artesanales.

La actividad  principal que desarrolla María  es la crianza de ovinos, caprinos y aves de corral, el sistema de crianza es en corrales y los alimenta a base de concentrado, de tal manera que cuando alcanzan tamaño y peso exacto los comercializa a los comerciantes mayoristas de la zona; María en esta actividad cuenta con 10 años de experiencia. Su cónyuge se dedica a la agricultura donde tiene sembrado limón y cosecha semanalmente, y le permite tener otros ingresos adicionales; es decir existe una buena relación familiar.

El monto del crédito solicitado por María es de S/. 1000 nuevos soles, y será para la  compra de alimento balanceado para animales y mejoras en el corral de los mismos. Esto en el tiempo le va permitir mejorar su calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
María, 48, is a married woman with two children in her care.  She lives in her own house with her spouse and children in the rural part of Tambogrande District, Piura Department.  This sector only has electricity; water is gotten from artisanal wells.

María’s main activity is raising sheep, goats and barnyard fowl in corrals; she feeds them feed concentrate so that when they reach exact size and weight she sells them to local wholesalers.  María has 10 years’ experience in this activity.  Her spouse is in agriculture; he has lemons growing that he harvests weekly allowing them to earn extra income; that is to say, there is a good family relationship between them.

The amount of the loan María is requesting is 1000 new soles and it will be used to buy nutritionally balanced animal feed and to upgrade their corrals.  

In time, this will allow her to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and to upgrade the corrals.

loans.name: Munhzul

texts.en: Munhzul is 53 years old and lives with her son in a ger (Mongolian yurt) in Selenge province, Mongolia. Her husband passed away recently, her elder children live separately and the younger one is a school student. She started her meat retailing business in 1992 by renting a counter in a market. Over the years she gained many trusted suppliers and regular customers. She is a contracted supplier of many small restaurants. The price of meat almost doubled within a year. Therefore, she needs some additional supply in order to run her business. She is a sharp and hardworking woman who says,"I have many children to support and my business is in a very vulnerable position. Therefore, I need to pass this moment". She's requesting 3,000,000 MNT to buy more meat from herders.

loans.use: To buy more meat from herders

loans.name: Mkwalia Group

texts.en:
Sultan, who is in his early 30s, is single with one small child.  He has been running a fruits and vegetables stall and has a small shop where he sells dry foods like sugar, wheat flour, baking flour, salt, beans, cooking oil, paraffin, match boxes and cigarettes for five years now.  He works from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be his 7th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loans to make bricks, to buy stock to replace the missing items in both of his businesses, and to cover household expenses.  Sultan has paid back all of his loans successfully.  He wants to use this loan to increase his retail shop's stock, to buy more fruits and vegetables and to make some bricks.  His dream is to one day be able to build his own house.

He will share this loan with his loan group, "Mkwalia," which has a total of 10 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: to increase retail shop stock, to buy more fruits and vegetables and to make bricks.

loans.name: Andrès

texts.es:
Andrés es un hombre de 42 años de edad, con 01 hijo a su cargo,  vive con su cónyuge e hijo en casa propia en el distrito de Cayalti, provincia de Chiclayo, departamento de Lambayeque; esta zona cuenta con los servicios básicos de luz, agua y desagüe.

La actividad principal a la que se dedica Andrés es el  servicio de reparación y soldadura de vehículos, este negocio lo tiene en su domicilio y cuenta con bastante experiencia desde hace 12 años. Así mismo cuenta con clientes ya establecidos. Su cónyuge se dedica a la crianza de animales menores. 

El monto del crédito otorgado es de S/. 3,000 nuevos soles y será para la compra de repuestos para vehículos motorizados; para así contar con un mejor servicio y ofrecerlo a sus clientes, y de esta manera logrará atender la demanda insatisfecha en el lugar,  y en el tiempo le va permitir mejorar su calidad de vida la de su familia.
texts.en:
Andrés is a 42 year old man with a son in his care.  He lives with his spouse and son in his own house in Cayalti District, Chiclayo Province and Lambayeque Department.  This zone has basic utilities: electricity, water and sewage.

Andrés’ main activity is repairing and welding vehicles.  The business is located at home and he has 12 years’ experience.  He also has an established regular clientele.  His spouse raises small farm animals.

The granted loan is for 3000 new soles that will be used to buy spare parts for motor vehicles in order to have better service available to offer his customers and this way be able to meet unmet local need and in time lead to improved family quality of life.

loans.use: to buy spare parts.

loans.name: Las Vecinas  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Las Vecinas está formado por 8 socias y 1 socio quienes son amigos, vecinos y viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, lugar de clima frió, por su gran belleza arquitectónica fue nombrada en Diciembre de  1999 como Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, su cultura y tradiciones aun son mantenidas por su gente. Nuestras socias son personas amables, gentiles y de un corazón cálido el mismo que enamora a todos sus visitantes, se caracterizan por ser trabajadores laborando arduamente cada día para mejorar la economía de sus hogares.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Alcira, tiene 52 años de edad, está divorciada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos quienes son todos mayores de edad, casados y viven independientes. No tienen una casa propia por lo que vive en la misma casa en donde trabaja.

Doña Alcira labora hace 11 años como empleada domestica, como tiene una muy buena amistad con sus empleadores le han brindado la oportunidad para que se ponga su propio negocio en la casa, su negocio es un bazar en donde labora de lunes a sábados desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6, también vende ropa y calzado por catalogo, actividad que la desempeña hace 4 años, estas actividades las realiza sin descuidar el trabajo de empleada domestica.
 
Es socia de la banca comunal hace 4 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de artículos de bazar, ropa y zapatos para continuar creciendo en su negocio.

Su sueño es llegar a tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
The “Las Vecinas” (The Neighbors) communal bank has nine members, 8 women and one man, who are friends and neighbors living in various parts of the city of Cuenca, a cold climate city.  Because of its great architectural beauty it was designated a World Cultural Heritage Site in 1999.  Its people still preserve their culture and traditions.  

Our members are kind, pleasant people who are warm-hearted and who enchant all visitors.  They are noted for being hardworking people who daily strive to improve their home’s economy.

One of the group members is Alcira, 52.  She’s divorced and has four adult children who are now married and living on their own.  She does not have a house of her own so lives in the same house where she works.

Alcira has been working as a domestic employee for the last 11 years and since she has a good friendship with her employers they’ve allowed her to install her business in the house.  Her business is a store where she works Monday through Saturday from 8am until 6pm; she also sells clothes and shoes via catalogue, an activity she’s carried out for four years.  She does these activities without neglecting her tasks as a domestic employee.

She’s been a communal bank member for 4 years and will use her new loan to buy merchandise for the store, clothes and shoes to continue growing in her business.  Her goal is to get a house of her own.

loans.use: to buy clothes and shoes.

loans.name: Javier Riky

texts.es:
Javier es un joven de 25 años de edad, vive al lado de su esposa con la cual tiene un pequeño de 2 años de edad el cual es su adoración y el motivo por el cual el trabaja con muchas ganas para darle lo necesario y sobre todo con mucho amor. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Camana, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener una preciosas playas en las cuales uno puede gozar de lo hermoso de su paisaje, también se desarrolla la pesca y la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de arroz, considerado uno de los mejores del mundo, también podemos encontrar variedad de platos típicos pero en especial el riquísimo Chupe de Camarones. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta jugar futbol con sus vecinos y amigos de su barrio. Debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres solo tuvo estudios secundarios pero le hubiera gustado estudiar en la universidad.

Con mucho entusiasmo Javier trabaja en su negocio como chofer de mototaxi, el le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 12 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 40 clientes en el día, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque hay mucha demanda.

Javier está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar un mantenimiento a su vehículo y comprar repuestos, de esta manera podrá conducir un vehículo en buenas condiciones, lo que le permitirá seguir luchando cada día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hijo”.
texts.en:
Javier is 25 years old, and lives with his wife. Together, they have a 2-year-old little boy, who is his pride and joy and also his motivation to work hard so that he can provide him with what he needs and, most of all, with lots of love. His home is located in the city of Camana, which is known for its lovely beaches, where you can enjoy the beauty of its landscape. There is also fishing and agriculture, especially crops of rice, which are considered some of the best in the world. You can also find a variety of typical dishes, particularly the delicious shrimp "chupe." When he has some free time he enjoys playing soccer with his neighbors and local friends. Due to his parents's few financial resources, he only went to high school, but he would have liked to attend university.

With great enthusiasm, Javier works in his business as a mototaxi driver. He dedicates about 12 daily hours to work, and may serve up to 40 passengers during the day. He believes his business is going well because there is high demand. 

Javier is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they have offered him he will be able to perform maintanence on his vehicle and purchase spare parts. This way, he will be able to drive his vehicle in good condition, which will allow him to keep fighting every day for his greatest dream to come true: to give his son a good education.

loans.use: to maintain his vehicle and purchase spare parts.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en: Wilson is a 37-year-old married man with three children living in Kasese, Uganda. He is a teacher and has been in service three years. He has always had a passion for guiding youth and being a teacher has helped him realize his dream. His personal goal is to build a hostel for students so as to earn an extra income. Wilson wants money to buy construction materials to build the hostel.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build a hostel

loans.name: Aganatia

texts.en: Aganatia is a 38-year-old married man with four children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been operating a retail shop for seven years. He started with 800,000 shillings and now has 3,000,000 shillings as working capital. His hardship is high fuel and transport costs. His personal goal is educating his children, and his business goal is expanding his business into a new market. Aganatia wants money to buy sugar and salt for resale.

loans.use: to buy sugar and salt for resale

loans.name: Rose

texts.en: Rose is a 27-year-old married woman with three children living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been running a retail shop for four years, and she got capital from her husband. Her hardship is inadequate capital to purchase stock. Her personal goals are educating her children and building a permanent home. Her business goal is expanding her business into new markets. Rose wants money to buy beer, soda, and sugar for resale.

loans.use: to buy beer, soda, and sugar

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy charcoal for resale

loans.name: Goreti

texts.en:
Goreti is 48 years old, widowed and has four children.  She lives in Kasese, Uganda. She has been selling second-hand clothes for eight years. 

Goreti is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy clothes to sell.  Her hardship is inadequate capital to purchase stock. Her business goal is expanding her business into new markets.  Goreti's personal goals are educating her children and building a permanent home.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to sell.

loans.name: Bonanza  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Bonanza está formado por 7 socias luchadoras que con su trabajo arduo logran tener solvencia económica y así apoyar en la economía de sus hogares, nuestras socias no pasan desapercibidas ya que su carisma es muy grande al igual que su sentido del humor el cual hace que su grupo siga adelante. Viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad tiene un clima frió, esta bañada por 4 ríos los que le dan el nombre de la Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos, desde Diciembre de 1999 es Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad nombrado por la belleza de su Centro Histórico, también cuenta con bellos lugares para visitar y su gastronomía es muy variada.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Cinthya, tiene 26 años de edad, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 8 y 2 años de edad, su primer hijo  estudia en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora en un taller de latonería (arreglo de latas de vehículos), no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de sus padres pero independientes.

La Señora. Cinthya es de profesión costurera y tienen un taller de confección con su madre ya que laboran en el negocio a medias, trabajan de lunes a sábados sin un horario fijo, se encuentran en el negocio hace 8 años.
 
Este es el primer cerdito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de telas e hilos. 

Su sueño es de agrandar su negocio hasta llegar a tener una fábrica.
texts.en:
The “Bonanza” communal bank is composed of 7 hardworking members who by means of their hard work manage to have economic solvency to support their homes’ economy.  Our members do not pass unnoticed because their charisma as well as their sense of humor is very great which leads to their group moving forward.  

They live in various parts of the city of Cuenca, a city with a cold climate that’s bathed by four rivers which give it the name of “Santa Rosa de los 4 Ríos.”  Since December, 1999, it’s been a World Cultural Heritage Site so designated because of the beauty of its historic city center.  It also has beautiful places to visit and its cuisine is very diverse.

One of the members of this group is Cinthya, 26.  She’s married and has two children who are 8 and 2 years old.  Her older son attends the little local elementary school.  Her husband works in an auto body shop.  She does not have a house of her own so lives in her parents’ house but independently.

By profession Cinthya’s a seamstress and has a sewing shop with her mother since they are equal partners in the business.  They work from Monday through Saturday with no fixed schedule; they’ve been in business 8 years.

This is the first loan she’s taken in the communal bank and will use it to buy fabric and thread.  Her greatest dream is to expand the business into a factory.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Sande

texts.en: Sande is a 25-year-old hardworking man living in Kasese, Uganda. He is a banker and has been in service for two years. His personal goal is building a permanent house as his residence and getting better qualifications as he wishes to become a bank manager. Sande wants money to pay school fees for himself.

loans.use: to pay school fees for himself.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, and beverages

loans.name: Maria Ysabel

texts.es:
Maria vive en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido en cualquier época del años, por ello se le conoce como la tierra del sol eterno, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura en especial el cultivo de algodón, paprika, uva, esparrago, entre otros. Como buena peruana le gusta mucho la comida  típica de nuestro país, el cual es la riquísima “Sopa Seca. Ella solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Administración. 

Día a día Maria trabaja en su negocio de venta de ropa por pedido, ella le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 4 horas al día, también tiene su negocio de alquiler de mototaxi, también vende hamburguesas por las noches ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque atiende de manera amable a sus clientes.

Maria está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le ahn brindado ella podrá mas mercadería para su negocio como chompas, pantalones, casacas, buzos, de esta manera ella tendrá mayor variedad de productos y mejorara sus ingresos, así ella seguirá trabajando para hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” construir su casa de material noble ya que cuando ocurrió el terremoto en el año 2007 su casa se derrumbo”.
texts.en:
